byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Merchant ship names and tonnages to be withheld in wkly lists of ship losses
snippet: LONDON, April 30--The loss of the submarines Tarpon and Sterlet, presumably with all hands, and the bombing and sinking of the naval trawlers Bradman and Cape Siretoko were announced by the Admiralty today....

headline.main: TWO SUBMARINES LOST BY BRITAIN; Believed Destroyed With All Hands, Presumably During Action Off Norway NAVAL TRAWLERS BOMBED Two Sunk by German Planes, but Crews Are Rescued-- Sea Fight Reported

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 30--The loss of the submarines Tarpon and Sterlet, presumably with all hands, and the bombing and sinking of the naval trawlers Bradman and Cape Siretoko were announced by the Admiralty today.
